bibl.title: Interest in Ptolemaic Loans of Seed-corn in the "House of Hathor" (Pathyris).
bibl.note: Loans from Pathyris with interest included. - Interest not yet included in loans from Pathyris.

bibl.title: Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part II

bibl.seg: VANDORPE Katelijn, Interest in Ptolemaic Loans of Seed-corn in the "House of Hathor" (Pathyris).

Willy CLARYSSE, Antoon SCHOORS and Harco WILLEMS (Edd.), Egyptian Religion: The Last Thousand Years. Studies Dedicated to the Memory of Jan Quaegebeur. Part II = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 85 (Leuven, 1998) pp. 1459-1468, 1 tabl.
Loans from Pathyris with interest included. - Interest not yet included in loans from Pathyris.
